snippet: A stronger dollar and weak global inflation are putting downward pressure on the pace of price increases in the U.S. economy, posing a challenge for the Federal Reserve, a top Fed official said on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Fed's Evans Says Dollar Putting Downward Pressure on Inflation
headline.main: Fed's Evans Says Dollar Putting Downward Pressure on Inflation

lead_paragraph: A stronger dollar and weak global inflation are putting downward pressure on the pace of price increases in the U.S. economy, posing a challenge for the Federal Reserve, a top Fed official said on Saturday.
